languages.text: {n}Расхохотавшись, Ульфар пихает локтем Абеляра.{/n} "Твоя порода, да? Признайся, ты в молодости таким же был? Резким, как удар гарпуна по тролльим яйцам?"
{n}Laughing, Ulfar elbows Abelard.{/n} "Your brood, eh? Admit it, were you like that in your youth? As sharp as a harpoon strike to an ice troll's balls?"
languages.original_text: {n}Расхохотавшись, Ульфар пихает локтем Абеляра.{/n} "Твоя порода, да? Признайся, ты в молодости таким же был? Резким, как удар гарпуна по тролльим яйцам?"

traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}ウルファーは笑いながら、アベラルドを肘で突く。{/n}「お前の巣族だよな？認めろよ。お前も若かりしころは、あんな感じだったんだろ？氷河巨人に打ち込むハープーンのような鋭さだったんじゃないのか？」
languages.original_text: {n}Laughing, Ulfar elbows Abelard.{/n} "Your brood, eh? Admit it, were you like that in your youth? As sharp as a harpoon strike to an ice troll's balls?"

traits.locale_text: {n}ウルファーは笑いながら、アベラルドを肘で突く。{/n}「お前の巣族だよな？認めろよ。お前も若かりしころは、あんな感じだったんだろ？氷河巨人に打ち込むハープーンのような鋭さだったんじゃないのか？」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}乌尔法大笑着，用手肘顶了顶阿贝拉德。{/n}“你的子嗣，是吧？我说，你年轻的时候，嘴巴也这么厉害吗？像锋利的鱼叉，捅穿冰霜巨魔的卵蛋？”
languages.original_text: {n}Laughing, Ulfar elbows Abelard.{/n} "Your brood, eh? Admit it, were you like that in your youth? As sharp as a harpoon strike to an ice troll's balls?"

traits.locale_text: {n}乌尔法大笑着，用手肘顶了顶阿贝拉德。{/n}“你的子嗣，嗯？承认吧，你年轻那会儿也是这样的吗？就像捅冰霜巨魔卵蛋的鱼叉一样锋利？”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Hilare, Ulfar donne un coup de coude à Abélard.{/n} « Des paroles dignes de votre arrière-petite-fille, hein ? Admettez-le, vous étiez exactement pareil dans votre jeunesse ! Aussi incisif qu'un coup de harpon dans le derrière d'un troll des glaces ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Laughing, Ulfar elbows Abelard.{/n} "Your brood, eh? Admit it, were you like that in your youth? As sharp as a harpoon strike to an ice troll's balls?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Hilare, Ulfar donne un coup de coude à Abélard.{/n} « Des paroles dignes de votre arrière-petite-fille, hein ? Admettez-le, vous étiez exactement pareil dans votre jeunesse ! Aussi incisif qu'un coup de harpon dans le derrière d'un troll des glaces ! »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ulfar, entre risas, le da un codazo a Abelard.{/n} «Su progenie, ¿eh? Admítalo, ¿así era usted en sus tiempos mozos? ¿Tan mordaz como un arpón en los cojones de un troll de hielo?».
languages.original_text: {n}Laughing, Ulfar elbows Abelard.{/n} "Your brood, eh? Admit it, were you like that in your youth? As sharp as a harpoon strike to an ice troll's balls?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar, entre risas, le da un codazo a Abelard.{/n} «Su progenie, ¿eh? Admítalo, ¿así era usted en sus tiempos mozos? ¿Tan mordaz como un arpón en los cojones de un troll de hielo?».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ulfar stößt Abelard lachend mit dem Ellbogen.{/n} "Eure Brut, was? Gebt es zu, wart Ihr in Eurer Jugend auch so? Scharf wie ein Harpune, die die Eier eines Eistrolls durchbohrt?"
languages.original_text: {n}Laughing, Ulfar elbows Abelard.{/n} "Your brood, eh? Admit it, were you like that in your youth? As sharp as a harpoon strike to an ice troll's balls?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar stößt Abelard lachend mit dem Ellbogen.{/n} "Eure Brut, was? Gebt es zu, wart Ihr in Eurer Jugend auch so? Scharf wie ein Harpune, die die Eier eines Eistrolls durchbohrt?"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Kahkahalara boğulan Ulfar, dirseğiyle Abelard'ı dürtüyor.{/n} "Şunlar seninkiler mi? Doğruyu söyle, sen de gençken böyle miydin? Buz trollerine bile taş çıkartmışsındır sen!"
languages.original_text: {n}Laughing, Ulfar elbows Abelard.{/n} "Your brood, eh? Admit it, were you like that in your youth? As sharp as a harpoon strike to an ice troll's balls?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Kahkahalara boğulan Ulfar, dirseğiyle Abelard'ı dürtüyor.{/n} "Şunlar da seninkiler mi? Doğru söyle, sen de gençken böyle miydin? Buz trollerine bile taş çıkartmışsındır sen!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
